storyInfo: Młynar arrives at a worrying conclusion, forcing the Nearl sisters into an even more difficult predicament. 'What does it mean to be a knight?' Maria ponders to herself.

attributes.text: On what will you shine your light? On what can you shine your light?
To do your utmost. That is the glory that all knights should seek.
Glory. Glory did not betray Kazimierz. It is the people that abandoned glory.
That does not mean glory is meaningless.
The word glory itself is far too intangible, Margaret. Wearing it on one's sleeve is foolish.
That is why knights must prove themselves by their deeds alone.
Suppose the cause to which you've dedicated your life turns to sneer at all that you are... Do your deeds still hold meaning?

attributes.content: Ngh...!
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Uncle!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: How many times I have told you? Never speak to your opponent in combat.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Then why won't you use your Arts?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I should ask you myself. Your Arts have improved. You must have realized the truth, then?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: About that... yes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: However...! Uncle Młynar, right now, I would prefer it if you—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Say no more.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You sent my sword flying. That means you've won, Margaret.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Even though... you never used your Arts at all?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It was a match, nothing more, nothing less. All other factors are mere excuses. When have I ever taught you to be so indecisive?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you've come to understand the price your grandfather paid for your naivety, then you must understand the meaning of your return.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Margaret, you are trampling my father's will.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: For us to become cowards?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness.'
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Right. Fear neither hardship nor darkness... You won the battle. You won the chance to continue your mistakes.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Do remember to say your prayers, and pray that your stubbornness won't drag too many souls into its wake.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Uncle...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Do you still believe those times are forever behind us?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret, how dare you ask me this question?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I have a telephone meeting later. Everyone is busy with the Major. As for your little charade... Try not to do anything to distract me from my responsibilities.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Face reality. See how others must live. See their needs. And stop imposing your fantasies on them for your own glory.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You find yourself disappointed, sooner or later.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: But what if I don't end up like you?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Like me...? You?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Looks like those Sarkaz friends of yours took excellent care of you during your exile.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Margaret!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret, are you okay...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yes... I'm fine.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Okay, Maria. Stop squeezing her like that. Her arms must be going numb.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh! S-Sorry... Does it hurt?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: *Sigh*. I never imagined I would find you two dueling today—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —Młynar hits hard, doesn't he?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: How has he been the past few years?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Normal. He's been living a pretty normal, routine life. He heads out early for work and comes home late, always busy with meetings or dealing with difficult clients, and, once in a while, he gets into debates on account of the 'Nearl' name.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But I'm sure this 'normal' feels enough like a punishment for him.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I mean, he used to be so... Uh, never mind! Let's talk about something else!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Look at how you frown. You won, but it doesn't feel like it, does it? Seems that stubbornness runs in the family.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: At least Uncle Młynar's agreed to let Margaret compete in the Major, right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If she takes the crown again, I'm sure that'll be the end of his complaints.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: After, it's all for—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: For family. For myself. For... a knight's glory.
To tell the truth, I know the bounty of the land of the knights today is a far cry from the glory of the past.
Maria? Why so quiet all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Are you hungry?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: A-Auntie!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Let's give Margaret some time to rest.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Hello?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: My apologies. I just got home, and I had some family matters to deal with... Not a problem. The documents have been annotated.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Sponsoring the Major...? Me? No, please, stop pulling my leg. You know I'm not suited to something like that...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Right... Of course. It's work. I shouldn't be trying to bargain. My apologies.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Yes, of course. I will be there right away.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: The window's open, Toland.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You're getting rusty. I could sense your presence.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: But, please, come in through the front door next time.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Okay... Doesn't look like you're hurt.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: He held back.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yeah... He didn't use his Arts after all.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: And actually, it's been a long time since he had that look on his face...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —Alright! Get up.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: So what's your plan now? You need to report to the Knights Association, don't you?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: There is a complicated process, but it's not time yet.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret... We barged into that unfinished match... Is it really going to be alright?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright? You're looking at an exiled Infected, Maria. She smashed through the arena walls and waltzed onto the field, remember?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: With all that she has done, what's interrupting a match or two?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: R-Right... You have a point...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Trouble is an old friend. Be it then or now, so long as Kazimierz remains as it is, we will face all manner of obstacle in our path.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So are you going to compete in the Major, Margaret?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Is that... something that you absolutely have to do?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It's just... you finally got to come home... I don't think the Association would make things difficult for Uncle and the family...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But if the Chamber of Commerce have their eyes on you again like they did a few years ago, then we—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria has a point, Margaret.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how the Knights Association deals with this, or what the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's decision is. To the masses and the knights, you are still the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I have to admit... I don't get it either. I don't understand why you insist on competing again... I don't understand what you're thinking.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But I'm sure you have it figured out. Stubbornness may run in the family, but that's not the same thing as recklessness.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: This is just the beginning...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Whether I take the crown or not... it's just a beginning.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Maria, Auntie Zofia. If all we do is cower on the sidelines and look on at society with indifference, if we only comfort ourselves, insisting that nothing can be done—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: —then when will we truly regain our glory?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Are the knights of Kazimierz destined to wallow forever in times long past?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So you want to...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Shining light on the tragedies of the world is not a permanent commitment to dispelling the darkness.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Sometimes... Sometimes, it's just to illuminate the path forward, to help those who are lost see things from a new perspective.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Even in today's Kazimierz, there is still meaning to keeping our faith.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright... Sounds like you've made up your mind.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But you put on such a show as soon as you got back to Kazimierz. If there's a chance... Margaret.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Don't forget you're home. You have family and memories here. You have Maria... and me.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: At the very least, give Maria some time to fawn on you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: A-Auntie! What are you saying?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: She's been working really hard lately, you know?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I-I haven't...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yes, I know. I'm proud of you, Maria. You've really... really grown up.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Maria Nearl, you will be an excellent knight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Oh... right.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: About that... Margaret. If you're thinking of joining the Major, you probably won't have time to rack up the points you need, right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It will be difficult, but not impossible.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Right... Just like the Candle Knight who's been popular the past few years. I understand it didn't even take her a month to earn enough points.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: That may be the case, but the Candle Knight racked up her points early in the preliminaries. Even if Margaret gains the Knights Association's approval right away, we'd still be cutting it close.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What's your plan?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The competition's rules have changed, but the basics are still the same. So long as I scrape together a win in the melees, I should still stand a chance.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But... that's too risky! I drew a lot of attention when I stepped into the ring. If you take to the arena yourself, you're bound to attract even greater opponents...!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Right, and we can't say for sure that the corporations won't pull their dirty tricks on you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Anyway, we need to come up with a plan as soon...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I... I have an idea.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Independent knights... like me and Margaret... aren't part of a knightclub, so we compete as part of a 'knight family,' right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That's true... You used the Nearl family coat of arms during your matches.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: And, if I remember correctly, it's not just knights of the same knightclub who are allowed to transfer their points, right? Those from the same knight family are allowed to do the same?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: —Maria?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: No, I can't accept that.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Maria, those points are proof of your gallantry as a knight. I can't—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: —I don't care!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I... I chose to become a knight because I wanted our home to be ours.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Nearl family's ancestors... Grandfather... Father... and you. I didn't want to lose all that. I wanted to protect the Nearls' glory.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But... But then I realized... I was too naive about all this.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If we followed them into the Major, if we became their knights just to uphold our knightly name... then... we wouldn't have changed anything.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...I don't actually want to become a knight.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Knights can't change the knighthood, Margaret.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If there is something only you can do, I beg you to do it.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I... I just want this home to still be our home...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I understand, but I still need some time to think.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Alright now... Don't be so gloomy. We've got lots of ways to go about this.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Why don't we go to Old Marcin's bar for a drink later? It's been such a long time. I'm sure he wants to talk to you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What about Uncle...?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You should try not to bother him. I'll check up on him.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: There's one thing, Margaret.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: There are a lot more Infected in the city than before, and the Armorless Union is also much more active.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Be careful.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Report.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight and Młynar Nearl just fought each other in a duel.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I read their lips. Neither looked very happy.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I seriously hope she'll just stay home and spend some time with her family. They haven't seen each other in so long.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Please don't get yourself mixed up in anything you shouldn't, Radiant Knight. I don't want any more trouble to deal with.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Uh, Platinum, so what should we do...?
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Keep an eye on her.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: If she tries anything, let me know right away.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What are the others up to? Mission-wise?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Uh... Per the rules...
attributes.name: Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I'm not allowed to know.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Whatever. It's either something about the Infected or the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: As long as we don't have to lift a finger, it's all fine by me.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Młynar...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Młynar!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Do you need something?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Are you... okay?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Margaret might've stopped herself in that last duel, but you weren't wearing your helmet...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You needn't worry about me.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: She caught you by surprise... didn't she?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: She caught all of us by surprise. After all... she's become far stronger than any of us could've imagined.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Is that all you have to say...?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I'm worried about you, Młynar.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I've fallen so far that it falls on you to worry about me.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Right. I'm sure even you have realized.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It's just a sprain, nothing more... Her swordsmanship has come a long way, but she's not yet at the point where I can't handle her.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: But... hmm.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You're wondering what made Margaret like this?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Of course, there are her Sarkaz friends. They are all... noble souls. Shockingly noble.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It might just be that she's gone through more over these past few years than either of us could imagine.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maybe... you could swallow your pride just a little and talk to either of them?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Confident enough to order me around now, are you? Did coaching Maria give you such a sense of fulfillment?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Before Margaret became the center of attention, you and your brother were heroes to all of us.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I know how you see the rest of us. Marcin does as well, and so do V and Kowal. Though... at the same time... I am just as disappointed in you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Let's leave it there. Have fun with work.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Looks like someone used to live here...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Right, there are still traces of their lives... but... are they hiding?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: This is... the third settlement we've come across.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: In a glittering city, the Infected always run to cold, cramped corners like these.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: It's hard to believe... How could Kazimierz be this heartless...?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Are these the Infected Amiya and the kind old knight talked about?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Right... If even the knights knew about this, then things can't be that simple.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Do you still have any strength left, Nightingale? It's getting late. We can head back for some rest, if you need.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No, I can hang on for a little longer.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: In that case—
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Ah—What's the noise?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: A wrecking crew... They're tearing down the buildings... and the subterranean structures beneath.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: What if there are still Infected hiding below?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Remember everything you see, Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Perhaps Nearl knows something about this.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight walks down the hallway in silence.
The portraits of past champions line the hallway like fences on the side of the road, filling her entire path with their glory.
Maria...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You... Are you... the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: My apologies. Is this place not open yet?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Oh, uh... No... More accurately, it's not open to the public yet, though I am not sure you count as the public...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Right, sorry about this.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Uh... Forgive me, I haven't yet introduced myself.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please, call me Malkiewicz. I am the spokes—I am the staff member in charge of maintaining the wall of champions.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Forgive me for asking, Radiant Knight, but what are your plans right now?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Radiant Knight, huh? It wasn't until today that I finally regained that title.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So the Association gave their approval... Congratulations.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Malkiewicz comes back to his senses. The two of them turn their heads forward, to a portrait of the Radiant Knight herself.
Though she stands right next to him—or perhaps precisely because she's right next to him, a strange feeling washes over Malkiewicz.
The stubbornness is finally starting to loosen, and those things that are locked in place will soon be shattered.
You look much more gallant in person.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's been a few years, after all.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I understand that you... have your differences with the Knights Association and many others. Perhaps this isn't something someone the likes of me should say... But...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I still would like to tell you. I say this not in a professional capacity... But... Rather, as a regular enthusiast of the knighthood and a citizen of the Grand Knight Territory...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please, go on. You needn't be so reserved.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Welcome back to Kazimierz, Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I truly believe this is the beginning of something great.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Huh? Margaret, where have you been?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I took a walk around the Grand Knight Territory. Where is Uncle Młynar?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: He got summoned to a meeting just as I got home.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Good thinking, taking a look around town since you just got back. What do you think?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Not much seems to have changed.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Really? I kind of remember there have been a bunch of new fast food joints opening up at the mall the last couple years, though.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But it feels a lot emptier in here...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We had to sell off a lot of the furniture...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uncle Młynar is working for the corps, and I've been helping out at Master Kowal's workshop too. We don't have any troubles with our day-to-day expenses, actually, though Uncle Młynar doesn't tell me a whole lot...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But Old Marcin told me there are a lot of knight families and merchants who don't look too kindly on the Nearl family these days. Uncle Młynar might be facing a lot more pressure than we know.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: So... Do you think we'll ever patch things up with Uncle?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It'll be difficult, but I'm sure we can.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I had a few arguments with him before I left Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It was Auntie Zofia who told me that Uncle Młynar's been depressed about a lot of things, ever since our parents went missing.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But now... I can't bring myself to agree with what she said, not completely. I... I've seen a lot of people, and a lot of things on my journeys, and now... to face Uncle Młynar again...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Remember the story Grandpa used to tell us when we were kids? How, on their very first trip together, Uncle sorted out a lowly noble who hiked up the tax rates and made life hard on the countryside commoners?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I remember. We just couldn't imagine he used to be a brave young man like that.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It's not always the magnificent things that change a person's mind, Maria. I've come across many of those cases.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Maybe... he's been disillusioned ever since.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So how does it feel to be a knight now?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Actually... It's not quite how I imagined it.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yeah... I know what you mean.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That's why I will compete in the Major. Even if nobody understands me.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret... No... You have people in your corner too, right? Really impassioned supporters!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Do I?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Of course! I'm talking about Shining and Nightingale.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I only met them briefly, but when I saw all of you standing on the stage for such a highly anticipated match, I couldn't help but feel I could trust them with my back.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I've been meaning to ask, what have you been through these past few years?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I will tell you soon enough.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It will be a very long story, though, and it doesn't have a happy ending, not like those novels about knights I used to read to you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Well, we're sisters.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: We are.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Take everything you see and kill everyone! Get the food!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Robber

attributes.content: A knight? What's a Kazimierz knight doing here?! All the people here are dead, and you'll still get in our way?!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight...?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: What do knights stand for?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No! Nearl! It's too dangerous to run into the storm. You need somebody else—No, I'll come with you!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Faust.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I want her shot through the mouth.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: ...The knights never helped us guerillas.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Our leaders waited years, but in the end, help never came. We fought to the last, alone, until we were devoured by Ursus. Not many of us are still around to tell the tale.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight is back in the arena! What amazing spectacle does she have in store for us today? Will we bear witness to a once-in-decades legend?!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: Is she an Infected or a knight?! Will she reign victorious or will her opponent best her?! With all the dreams weighing on her blade, is it still sharp enough for battle?! Keep your eyes peeled!!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: Please welcome—The Radiant Knight—Maaaaargareeeeeeet Neeeeaaaaaaarl—!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: After a long journey, the knight finally made it home.
Just as always, the Radiant Knight steps forward.
She is about to face her greatest challenge.
